properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued February 6 at 8:22PM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Storm Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 55 kt and seas 6 to 11 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, southeast winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30
kt and seas 6 to 9 feet.

* WHERE...Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Storm Warning, from 10 AM to 7 PM EST Friday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST FRIDAY... ...STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY
